meanings.sent1: The little dog was ballsier than the big dog when facing the scary cat.
meanings.sent2: She became ballsier as she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The ballsier squirrel bravely faced the challenge of crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent4: Her ballsier attitude shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The ballsier knight fearlessly charged into battle against the dragon.

meanings.definition: Having more courage or determination than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's ballsier actions saved the city from disaster.
meanings.sent2: He felt ballsier than his friends as he took the lead in the daring adventure.
meanings.sent3: The ballsier explorer ventured into the unknown jungle without hesitation.
meanings.sent4: Her ballsier decision to speak up made a significant impact on the team.
meanings.sent5: The ballsier athlete pushed through the pain to achieve victory in the race.
